_source.short_desc: Fully integrated property management system technology to help hoteliers manage their hospitality business efficiently and profitably.
_source.long_desc: RMS offers an innovative, cloud-based property management system for full service, limited service and self service hotels and resorts. Maximize revenue, save time and money, and enhance the guest experience with software tailored to meet your property's unique needs and support your operational goals. We've helped thousands of properties increase bookings, connect with guests and run their hospitality business efficiently and profitably. See how RMS can grow with you and achieve success.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is formulated based on your property. It takes into account the number of sites or slips as well as the number of properties. There is also a one-time fee that is comprised of setup, migration, and training.
_source.target_audience: Small to Large-sized campgrounds, National Parks, RV parks, RV resorts, and marinas.

media.caption: A Modern Property Management System Designed for Campgrounds, RV Parks, and Marinas.
Streamline Property Operations with 100+ Channel Integrations
Guest Portal: Guest access to manage reservations, directly message your staff, make payments, and more.

category_features.name: Built-in Accounting
category_features.definition: Accounting functionality within the system, not requiring 3rd party assistance

category_features.definition: Manage catering operations/processes

category_features.definition: Designed for vacation rentals

category_features.definition: List rates/occupancy on various channels (ie. online travel agencies and global distribution systems)

category_features.definition: Marketing tool to have customers return for benefits

category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.definition: Automates workflows and triggers campaigns based on customer actions.

category_features.definition: Manages incentive programs such as profit sharing, stock awards, and individual bonus plans,

category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.definition: Organize, track, monitor and execute customer orders for goods, investments, or any other purcahses

category_features.definition: Manage channel partners through a portal where they can access all product information

category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Dynamic Pricing
category_features.definition: Real-time price adjustment for a product or service to reflect changing market conditions, geolocation, customer behavior, etc.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com is a cloud Work OS, where teams run their projects and everyday work, whether they are in the office, home or on-the-go.
related_products.features: monday.com is a Hospitality Property management software your team will actually enjoy using. It makes it fun and easy for everyone to collaborate, focus on what's important, and get more done at work. It's the first visual software of its kind and shows you exactly where things stand at a single glance. Finally get rid of painfully long email threads, cut down on meetings, and experience the satisfaction of turning things green when they're done.

related_products.short_desc: With Lodgify you can build a vacation rental website, receive direct bookings and manage all your reservations from one place.
related_products.features: Lodgify's  hospitality property management makes your business a lot more efficient by allowing you to manage your rental bookings, tasks, finances and guest communications from one place. Receive all reservations from your vacation rental website, phone and any external listings in one centralized calendar. Easily approve incoming bookings and create manual quotes for your guests using our property management system.

related_products.short_desc: eviivo is the original all-in-one booking suite. Our award-winning software is the simple way to manage guests, bookings and OTAs.
related_products.features: eviivo is the original all-in-one booking suite and industry leader in managing guests, bookings and OTAs. Channels sing to your tune as rates, availability, photos, descriptions, policies and more automatically sync and update across all your OTAs. Superior features include a stunning website and email designer, an intelligent payment solution and essential dashboards, all in our award-winning property management system. See why eviivo is trusted by over 20,000 properties worldwide!

related_products.short_desc: Hostaway is the fastest-growing vacation rental software for professional property managers in the world! More bookings. Less hassle.
related_products.features: Hostaway has become a market leader in marketing, sales, management, reporting, and communication for vacation rental property managers. One of the largest marketplaces in the industry and deep integrations with Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia, Booking.com, etc, property managers can increase exposure while saving time and money. Have a unique business model? We are the most versatile solution available. Trusted by thousands of property managers, Hostaway is known for stability, performance, and service.

related_products.short_desc: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders.
related_products.features: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders, and more. Professional Edition includes yield management, point-of-sale, and email marketing capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your inventories online, centralize reservations, process payments and get unified access to leading distribution channels.
related_products.features: Checkfront is a booking management platform trusted by thousands of tour operators worldwide. Our platform empowers businesses to sell tours and activities on any website by providing live inventory management, dynamic pricing, customer notifications, and channel distribution. Checkfront makes it easy to grow your business by automating your administration and housing all your business tools in one place.

related_products.short_desc: eZee Absolute is a Cloud-Based Hotel Management System which automates a hotel's day-to-day operations and increases hotel revenue.
related_products.features:
eZee Absolute is a complete cloud-based hotel PMS system that automates all hotel operations; namely front-office, back-office, reservations, billing, housekeeping to impart the best guest experience and increase revenue. It is packed with integrated booking engine and channel manager to provide an all-in-one hotel solution. 

It is a perfect fit for all types and sizes of accommodations viz. hotels, motels, guest houses, B&Bs, serviced and boutique apartments, hostels, and hotel groups.

related_products.short_desc: Cloudbeds offers a single platform for you to efficiently manage guests, staff, inventory, pricing, and data in real-time.
related_products.features:
Cloudbeds is an easy-to-use hospitality platform that offers hoteliers a centralized solution to help run their property simply and effectively. With Cloudbeds, you have one login and one system that is always in sync.  

Our suite includes a PMS, Booking Engine, Channel Manager with 300+ connections, Revenue Management Tool, and Payments. Trusted by thousands of Hotels in over 148 countries, our solution helps hotels get more reservations and happier guests.

related_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use and low cost online booking system created for hotels, B&B's and hostels. Try it free with no commitment.
related_products.features: Sirvoy offers a suite of property management tools which include a Property Management System, Booking Engine, Website Builder and integrated Channel Manager. It's powerful, feature full system is incredibly easy to use offering hoteliers the flexibility to tailor the software to suit the needs of their property. Sirvoy's simplicity means setup is effortless and Customer Service is available 24/7 for ongoing training and support.

related_products.short_desc: iGMS is an all-in-one software integrated with robust tools to automate STR business management. Simplify hosting with a 14-day trial!
related_products.features: iGMS is the only vacation rental software that automates up to 90% of daily hosting tasks & management. Easily control all OTA accounts like Airbnb, Booking.com, & Vrbo from one multi-calendar. Grow direct bookings with our intuitive Website Builder. Automate your guest communication & cleanings management, accept payments and monitor your financial performance with ease. Collaborate with your team & use rich direct integrations to grow your revenue. Try 14 days for free (no credit card).

related_products.short_desc: innRoad is an award-winning, all-in-one property management system designed to meet the needs of hospitality businesses of all sizes.
related_products.features: innRoad's award-winning property management system is trusted by thousands of hoteliers around the world. This all-in-one software is specifically designed to save time, increase occupancy, boost revenue and provide guests with a seamless booking experience. Customers report a 20% increase in direct bookings and a 10% increase in room revenue when switching to innRoad. innRoad's all in one solution offers 24/7 live support, unlimited training, new monthly features, and free data migration.

similar_products.short_desc: innRoad is an award-winning, all-in-one property management system designed to meet the needs of hospitality businesses of all sizes.
similar_products.features: innRoad's award-winning property management system is trusted by thousands of hoteliers around the world. Customers report a 20% increase in direct bookings and a 10% increase in room revenue when switching to innRoad. innRoad's all in one solution offers 24/7 live support, unlimited training, new monthly features, and free data migration.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily get bookings, & manage reservations & payments from anywhere, with the world's most trusted hotel software for small properties
similar_products.features: Trusted by most small, independent properties globally, the Little Hotelier platform helps you get more reservations, control your operations, understand your business, have a website, take direct bookings online, & process payments - even on-the-go with our free mobile app. Designed and built with small properties in mind, our platform is simple, our set-up is quick, and our award-winning 24/7 help is always just one click away. Try free for 30 days. No Credit Card. Cancel anytime.

similar_products.short_desc: The property management system, online booking engine, and channel manager for your bed & breakfast, boutique hotel, or property group.
similar_products.features: Running a high-end independent bed & breakfast, boutique hotel, or property group isn't easy. We know because we've been there. You strive to provide your guests with a luxury experience. ThinkReservations makes it simple for you and your staff to make that happen. Whether you're just starting your business or looking to take things to the next level, our all-in-one PMS, booking engine, and channel manager is for you. Take back your time. Increase your revenue. Stand out without burning out.

similar_products.short_desc: NewBook's all-in-one property management suite is the most comprehensive solution for accommodation providers around the world.
similar_products.features: If you're looking for a way to increase bookings, boost revenue, and save valuable time and money, look no further! NewBook is an all-in-one property management suite designed to help accommodation providers manage their businesses within one central platform. Complete with all the tools you need to succeed, it's the most comprehensive property management solution available on the market.

similar_products.short_desc: Solonis is a cloud-based property management solution for hotels that offers booking charts, reports, utilities, reservations & more.
similar_products.features: Solonis is a cloud-based integrated property management system powered by an intuitive business intelligence platform. Designed by hospitality executives to serve the often fragmented operations of hotels, resorts, and other hospitality venues, properties using Solonis realize increased occupancy, enhanced guest experience, and revenue optimization.

similar_products.short_desc: Deliver better guest experiences, increase revenue, and reduce costs with one PMS that works, supported by a team of experts.
similar_products.features: RoomKeyPMS provides a PMS that gives independent hotels an advantage by making it easier and more affordable to provide the best guest experiences, increase revenue and reduce costs. With over 70,000 managed rooms across the US and Canada, they have proven themselves as a trusted hotel industry partner for almost 20 years. In addition to delivering a reliable, well-connected PMS, they pride themselves on superior customer service with their locally-based support team made up of former hoteliers.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully automate your guest experience & entire operation. For the first time, all-in-one place, all-in-one system.
similar_products.features:
Consolidate all your apps, dashboards, fees, and providers all in one place. Jurny has built the industry's first vertically integrated system. AI pricing, smart access control, noise sensor dashboard, guest verification software, PMS, messaging, channel management, cleaning management software, online reputation tracker, and more all-in-one system, all-in-one dashboard.

Take your operation and guest experience to the next level and join us on this new wave of the hospitality revolution.

similar_products.short_desc: WebRezPro cloud hospitality management software streamlines operations for all types of properties, saving time and maximizing revenue.
similar_products.features: WebRezPro is an innovative, all-in-one cloud property management system that simplifies operations for independent hotels and motels, multi-property groups, inns, vacation rentals, hostels and campgrounds, saving hoteliers time and money, boosting direct bookings, and improving the guest experience. Trusted by lodging operators since 2003, WebRezPro is consistently chosen for its powerful, flexible features and excellent customer support, and is used by 2000+ properties in 45 countries.

similar_products.short_desc: rezStream offers an easy-to-use solution that captures more reservations online AND simplifies how you manage operations.
similar_products.features:
Partner with rezStream for a Cloud-based property management system and online booking engine. Our modern solution will simplify the way you manage your day-to-day operations AND drive more bookings! Schedule automatic emails, easily set and manage rates, offer contactless check-ins, and connect to over 80 OTAs with our channel manager. 

We offer a true one-stop-shop Suite offering with a 99% customer satisfaction rating and 24/7 support. Schedule your demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Suite of property management solutions, designed to provide hotels with everything they need to operate efficiently.
similar_products.features: Jonas Chorum is a suite of streamlined, intuitive and flexible property management solutions, designed to provide hotels with everything they need to operate more efficiently and cost effectively, all while delivering a personalized guest experience. The cloud-based platform features a lineup of high-tech applications and user-friendly features, making it a superior software solution for independent hotels, chain hotels and hotel management companies.

similar_products.short_desc: Guesty is a powerful & robust platform that allows property management companies to simplify operations and scale their businesses.
similar_products.features: Guesty is an end-to-end platform for professional vacation rental management companies with 5+ listings. The robust software has 15+ features for all aspects of hospitality property management including channel management, automated guest communication, accounting, task management, payment processing, and more, making your guests' stay smoother & more enjoyable. Guesty integrates with dozens of tools in their marketplace, centralizing operations so users can manage everything from one place.

Cloudbeds is an easy-to-use hospitality platform that offers hoteliers a centralized solution to help run their property simply and effectively. With Cloudbeds, you have one login and one system that is always in sync.  

Our suite includes a PMS, Booking Engine, Channel Manager with 300+ connections, Revenue Management Tool, and Payments. Trusted by thousands of Hotels in over 148 countries, our solution helps hotels get more reservations and happier guests.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Property Management software automates back office, financial, and operational tools for real estate property managers. These applications provide rental management software tools for apartments, rental housing, commercial property, mobile home parks, storage facilities and property owner associations and enable users to track tenant information, vacancies, and leasing agreements. Real Estate Property Management solutions enable reporting on revenue generation, operational costs, cash flow, budgeting and forecasting. Real Estate Property Management software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Lease Management software and Real Estate Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental software automates business management, record keeping, and accounting for rental businesses, including retail stores and rental property management firms. These applications enable the automation and integration of core business processes such as point of sale (POS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), accounting and inventory management as well as customer satisfaction tools. Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reservations software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reservations tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reservations software manages hospitality industry reservations including web-based and onsite solutions. These applications offer a variety of customizable features designed to suit a wide variety of hospitality clients from hotels, motels, condos, and hostels to travel agents and tour operators. Organizations use Reservations software to speed the processing of information and increase the efficient use of available space. These solutions also typically provide integrated tools for a wide variety of business features from accounting and revenue reporting to maintenance and housekeeping management Reservations software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Rental software, Tour Operator software and Travel Agency software.

_source.short_desc: Cloud-based property management and reservation management system for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas.
_source.long_desc: RMS is a top-rated hospitality management platform that offers centralized, easy-to-use software for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas. Some of the key features include an inbuilt channel manager, dynamic pricing, an online booking engine and revenue management capabilities. With over 35 years of experience in hospitality technology, RMS has helped over 6,000 properties across the globe achieve increased revenue and operational efficiencies.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is formulated based on your property. It takes into account the number of sites or slips as well as the number of properties. There is also a one-time fee that is comprised of setup, migration, and training.
_source.target_audience: Small to Large-sized campgrounds, National Parks, RV parks, RV resorts, and marinas.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time, look professional, and keep your customers and business moving with Acuity's self-service reservation-booking magic. From the moment a customer books with you, Acuity's there to perform customer intake, automatically send customized email confirmations to you and your customers, deliver text reminders, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly. There's even a mobile app, for to manage when you're on-the-go. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody reservations and business software simplifies online appointment and reservation scheduling with automatic reminders.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers the most extensive online booking system on the market, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown booking website, or a widget for your own website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to make your life easier.
related_products.features: Booker's cutting-edge salon software helps your run and grow your salon with an all-in-one platform that understands you'd rather be focusing on your clients instead of your administrative duties. Manage your online bookings, point-of-sale, membership and loyalty programs, all while attracting new clients, and making sure they come back. Access your salon business anytime, anywhere, all on Booker's secure, cost-effective, cloud-based software.

related_products.short_desc: Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers.
related_products.features:
Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers. Manage all your appointments through one simple, sleek calendar system and give your business the freedom to grow. 

Bring on more customers and sharpen your brand image, while taking charge of your working hours. By listing your availability online, your customers can self-book their desired services. Focus on providing an excellent customer experience and let Setmore handle the paperwork.

related_products.short_desc: Peek Pro is an end to end solution for tour and activity operators to be able to run their businesses on and off their mobile devices
related_products.features: Peek Pro is an online reservation system that empowers activity operators to increase their revenue, save tons of time, and provide the absolute best service for their customers. Operators are especially wowed by our industry-leading mobile apps and the intuitive design of our back-office system. Features includes daily payouts, automated emails, resource & channel management, QR code scanning, gift certificates, free waivers, 20+ customizable reports, and so much more.

related_products.short_desc: Xola is an easy-to-use reservation, sales, and marketing system for tour and activity operators.
related_products.features: Xola is the only unified reservation, sales, and marketing platform for tour and activity businesses. Manage every kind of reservation (online, over the phone, in-person, or from a reseller) with real-time availability. Sell through the world's largest marketplaces in a few clicks. Increase online revenue with automated abandoned booking remarketing features and track your marketing success in easily with our Facebook Pixel and Google Analytics integrations. CC rates as low as 1.99% + 30 cents.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify FOH busywork while growing your following with our high-intent network, so you can focus on the guest.
related_products.features: Yelp Guest Manager helps restaurants manage all of their front-of-house operations across the entire dining experience through one fully integrated solution - by bringing together Yelp Waitlist, Reservations, Kiosk, Takeout, Table Management, online brand building and more into one product. Yelp Guest Manager combines Yelp's high-intent diner network with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations from takeout and delivery orders to dine-in seating.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for Fitness Studios.
related_products.features:
WellnessLiving, an all-in-one business management software, has all the tools you need to attract, convert, & retain more clients. 

We offer the fitness & wellness industry an affordable, easy-to-use, fully customizable platform that streamlines business management. Dynamic tools include online booking solutions, POS, payroll, reputation management, email/SMS marketing suite, rewards program, robust reporting, and so much more! It's the only software you need to run and grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Hotel software that lets every small property easily create & manage reservations and check guests in & out, even on-the-go!
similar_products.features: Trusted by the most small properties globally, Little Hotelier is the all-in-one platform to help you manage your reservations with ease. Bookings are sent straight to an easy-to-use calendar, & you can even set up automated guest communications. We'll keep all your channels & inventory in sync, ensuring everything auto-updates whenever a booking is made to eliminate double bookings & save time on manual work. Try free for 30 days. No Credit Card. Cancel anytime.

similar_products.short_desc: innRoad is an award-winning, all-in-one property management system designed to meet the needs of hospitality businesses of all sizes.
similar_products.features: innRoad's award-winning property management system is trusted by thousands of hoteliers around the world. This all-in-one software is specifically designed to save time, increase occupancy, boost revenue and provide guests with a seamless booking experience. Customers report a 20% increase in direct bookings and a 10% increase in room revenue when switching to innRoad. innRoad's all in one solution offers 24/7 live support, unlimited training, new monthly features, and free data migration.

similar_products.short_desc: The hotel commerce platform with everything you need to succeed. Sell, market, manage and grow your hotel - from one place.
similar_products.features: 33,000 hoteliers trust SiteMinder for smart and simple reservation management. With over 2 million reservations annually, coupled with the world's most powerful channel manager and an ecosystem of 700+ of the industry's best channels and applications, SiteMinder helps hotels of all sizes acquire guests, drive profit and manage property operations with ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based reservation software that allows you to control every aspect of your property. Easily manage reservations and rate plans.
similar_products.features: Cloudbeds is all-in-one reservation management software where you can manage reservations, rate plans, reporting, emails, and more all from one login. With our dashboard, you get an overview what?s happening today and what needs to be done tomorrow. Manage reservations with our intuitive drag-and-drop calendar and check guests in or out with ease. All movements are connected to reports that are built right into the interface with Cloudbeds so you and your staff are always in sync.

similar_products.short_desc: NewBook's leading reservation software can help you increase your direct online bookings by up to 600%!
similar_products.features: Need an easier way to take reservations? NewBook's Online Booking Engine has helped our users increase their direct bookings by up to 600%! Our reservation software comes complete with intelligent upselling tools, a mobile-friendly interface, and a streamlined booking experience your guests will love. Discover site selection tools, add-ons and activity bookings, and countless more features.

similar_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
similar_products.features: Save time, look professional, and keep your customers and business moving with Acuity's self-service reservation-booking magic. From the moment a customer books with you, Acuity's there to perform customer intake, automatically send customized email confirmations to you and your customers, deliver text reminders, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly. There's even a mobile app, for to manage when you're on-the-go. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

similar_products.short_desc: Centralize reservations, manage your inventories online, process payments and get unified access to leading distribution channels.
similar_products.features: Checkfront is a booking management platform trusted by thousands of tour operators worldwide. Our platform empowers businesses to sell tours and activities on any website by providing live inventory management, dynamic pricing, customer notifications, and channel distribution. Checkfront makes it easy to grow your business by automating your administration and housing all your business tools in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, software that takes the hard work out of reservations, payments & admin, while you focus on what matters most to you.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one reservation software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. Let clients easily make reservations 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Better manage your business with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: rezStream offers an easy-to-use solution that captures more reservations online AND simplifies how you manage operations.
similar_products.features:
Partner with rezStream for a Cloud-based property management system and online booking engine. Our modern solution will simplify the way you manage your day-to-day operations AND drive more bookings! Schedule automatic emails, easily set and manage rates, offer contactless check-ins, and connect to over 80 OTAs with our channel manager. 

We offer a true one-stop-shop Suite offering with a 99% customer satisfaction rating and 24/7 support. Schedule your demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. Square Appointments is an integrated POS that comes with online scheduling and payment processing so that you can run your whole business from one place. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully automate your guest experience & entire operation. For the first time, all-in-one place, all-in-one system.
similar_products.features:
Consolidate all your apps, dashboards, fees, and providers all in one place. Jurny has built the industry's first vertically integrated system. AI pricing, smart access control, noise sensor dashboard, guest verification software, PMS, messaging, channel management, cleaning management software, online reputation tracker, and more all-in-one system, all-in-one dashboard.

Take your operation and guest experience to the next level and join us on this new wave of the hospitality revolution.

similar_products.short_desc: The Flybook was founded in 2006 and manages reservations and operations for adventure parks, ziplines, tour, and rental providers.
similar_products.features: The Flybook helps adventure parks, ziplines, tour and rental providers manage their reservations and business operation. Founded in 2006, we are the original cloud-based software for the activity industry. The Flybook offers solutions for those who need more out of their reservation software: from managing multiple locations, to fine tuning and customizing offerings to fit your business model. Above all else, our advisory team is second to none, and we strive to be your closest business partner.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Airline Reservation System software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Airline Reservation System tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Airline Reservation System helps airline operators distribute tickets across multiple channels and optimize bookings for upcoming flights.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospitality Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospitality Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospitality Property Management software automates the marketing, booking and billing of rooms for hotels, motels and resorts. Hotel managers use these applications to optimize the efficiency of their operations, speeding the process of filling and turning over rooms. Hospitality Property Management solutions offer a variety of vacancy monitoring features and integration for marketing and sales tools, as well as billing functions. Management tools for other functions such as maintenance requests and housekeeping schedules are also often included. Hospitality Property Management software is related to Real Estate Property Management software, Rental software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant Management software integrates and automates accounting, scheduling and inventory control for restaurants. Restaurant Management applications typically offer a broad range of features that encompass traditional business necessities such as accounting, customer contact information, supplier data and payroll as well as restaurant-specific requirements such as table reservation management, guest management and menu costing. These applications also integrate with point of sale solutions and onsite or online credit card processing systems. Restaurant Management software is related to Food Service Distribution software and Food Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Tour Operator software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Tour Operator tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Tour Operator software manages packages, customers, ticketing, and itineraries for tour operators, vacation package companies, destination marketers, and transit companies. Tour Operator applications assist in generating price quotes, developing itineraries, and managing reservations for tour customers. They also assist tour operators in automating their business processes, such as accounting, invoicing, marketing, and business reporting. Tour Operator software is related to Reservations software and Travel Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Travel Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Travel Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Travel Agency software automates the front and back office activities of travel agencies, vacation packagers, destination marketers and transit companies. These applications assist in generating price quotes, developing itineraries and managing reservations for tour customers as well as providing easy integration into third party reservation systems. Travel Agency solutions assist agencies in automating their business processes, such as accounting, invoicing, marketing and business reporting. Travel Agency software is related to Reservations software and Tour Operator software.

_source.short_desc: Fully integrated property management system technology to help vacation rental operators manage properties efficiently and profitably.
_source.long_desc: RMS offers an innovative, cloud-based property management system for vacation rentals. Maximize revenue, save time and money, and enhance the guest experience with software tailored to meet your property's unique needs and support your operational goals. We've helped thousands of properties increase bookings, connect with guests and run their hospitality business efficiently and profitably. See how RMS can grow with you and achieve success.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is formulated based on your property. It takes into account the number of sites or slips as well as the number of properties. There is also a one-time fee that is comprised of setup, migration, and training.
_source.target_audience: Small to Large-sized campgrounds, National Parks, RV parks, RV resorts, and marinas.

media.caption: A Modern Property Management System Designed for Campgrounds, RV Parks, and Marinas.
Streamline Property Operations with 100+ Channel Integrations
Guest Portal: Guest access to manage reservations, directly message your staff, make payments, and more.

category_features.name: Commission Management
category_features.definition: Track employee commission potential and earnings

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Guest Communications
category_features.definition: Communicate with guests directly within the system

category_features.name: Guest Experience Management
category_features.definition: Capture guest experience at a granular level and utilize data to deliver tailored services

category_features.name: Housekeeping Management
category_features.definition: Manages the progress of housekeeping staff and tracks the status of each room.

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Owner Statements
category_features.definition: Report showing financial balance at the beginning and the end of the period, along with activity

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Reservations Management
category_features.definition: Create and manage reservations

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: Work Order Management
category_features.definition: Create work orders and track their status to completion

category_features.name: Built-in Accounting
category_features.definition: Accounting functionality within the system, not requiring 3rd party assistance

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Catering Management
category_features.definition: Manage catering operations/processes

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Extended Stay
category_features.definition: Designed for extended stay organizations (ie. longer than one week)

category_features.name: For Vacation Rentals
category_features.definition: Designed for vacation rentals

category_features.name: GDS/OTA Integration
category_features.definition: List rates/occupancy on various channels (ie. online travel agencies and global distribution systems)

category_features.name: Loyalty Program
category_features.definition: Marketing tool to have customers return for benefits

category_features.name: Maintenance Management
category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Automates workflows and triggers campaigns based on customer actions.

category_features.name: Multi-Property
category_features.definition: More than one location

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can schedule appointments online

category_features.name: Point of Sale (POS)
category_features.definition: Accept and process financial transactions

category_features.name: Single Property
category_features.definition: One location

related_products.short_desc: With Lodgify you can build a vacation rental website, receive direct bookings and manage all your reservations from one place.
related_products.features:
Lodgify is All-In-One solution for your vacation rental business. We provide the tools needed to build a beautiful website, accept online bookings with credit card payments and manage all your reservations from one place. Our channel manager allows synchronization of property data with Airbnb, Booking.com, Vrbo/Homeaway, Expedia and others.
Our software offers: Channel manager, PMS, Website builder, Payment processing, Booking System and much more.

related_products.short_desc: eviivo is the original all-in-one booking suite. Our award-winning software is the simple way to manage guests, bookings and OTAs.
related_products.features: Changeovers are a breeze for vacation rentals with eviivo's built-in Cleaning Dashboard. eviivo is the original all-in-one booking suite and industry leader for managing guests, bookings and OTAs. Channels sing to your tune as your rates, availability, photos, descriptions, policies and more are automatically synced and updated across all your OTAs. With eviivo, channels manage themselves. See why eviivo is trusted by over 20,000 properties worldwide!

related_products.short_desc: Your Porter App was founded in 2016. After being acquired by Guesty, the platform was re-launched in 2021 as Guesty For Hosts.
related_products.features: Guesty For Hosts, previously Your Porter App, is a mobile-first property management platform for hosts & property owners managing a handful of short-term rentals. Our platform provides all the features you need to save time, increase your listings' exposure, and manage on-the-go.

related_products.short_desc: Hostaway is the fastest-growing vacation rental software for professional property managers in the world! More bookings. Less hassle.
related_products.features: Hostaway has become a market leader in marketing, sales, management, reporting, and communication for vacation rental property managers. One of the largest marketplaces in the industry and deep integrations with Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia, Booking.com, etc, property managers can increase exposure while saving time and money. Have a unique business model? We are the most versatile solution available. Trusted by thousands of property managers, Hostaway is known for stability, performance, and service.

related_products.short_desc: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders.
related_products.features: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders, and more. Professional Edition includes yield management, point-of-sale, and email marketing capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: eZee Absolute is a Cloud-Based Hotel Management System which automates a hotel's day-to-day operations and increases hotel revenue.
related_products.features:
eZee Absolute is a complete cloud-based hotel PMS system that automates all hotel operations; namely front-office, back-office, reservations, billing, housekeeping to impart the best guest experience and increase revenue. It is packed with integrated booking engine and channel manager to provide an all-in-one hotel solution. 

It is a perfect fit for all types and sizes of accommodations viz. hotels, motels, guest houses, B&Bs, serviced and boutique apartments, hostels, and hotel groups.

related_products.short_desc: Cloudbeds offers a single platform for you to efficiently manage guests, staff, inventory, pricing, and data in real-time.
related_products.features:
Cloudbeds is an easy-to-use hospitality platform that offers hoteliers and hosts a centralized solution to help run their property simply and effectively. 
With Cloudbeds, you have one login, one system that is always in sync. Our suite includes a PMS, Booking Engine, Channel Manager with 300+ connections, Revenue Management Tool, and Payments. Trusted by thousands of properties in over 155 countries, our solution helps our clients achieve more reservations and happier guests.

related_products.short_desc: iGMS is an all-in-one software integrated with robust tools to automate STR business management. Simplify hosting with a 14-day trial!
related_products.features: iGMS is the only vacation rental software that automates up to 90% of daily hosting tasks & management. Easily control all OTA accounts like Airbnb, Booking.com, & Vrbo from one multi-calendar. Grow direct bookings with our intuitive Website Builder. Automate your guest communication & cleanings management, accept payments and monitor your financial performance with ease. Collaborate with your team & use rich direct integrations to grow your revenue. Try 14 days for free (no credit card).

related_products.short_desc: Rent Manager property management software is for companies-global enterprises and mom-and-pops-that manage all varieties of properties.
related_products.features: Rent Manager property management software is suited for any length of stay. The short-term rentals feature set enables RV parks, hotels, hostels, and vacation-rental owners to check guests in and out, manage reservations, and keep payment information on file.

related_products.short_desc: For multi-property managers, resorts, B&Bs, vacation rental owners. The best value in the industry. Discover what you've been missing!
related_products.features: Bookerville offers innovative, flexible, always-evolving cloud-based property management software for short-term vacation rental managers with 1 to 1000s of properties at a reasonable cost. Manage your bookings, automate and simplify time consuming tasks. Includes owner, housekeeper, maintenance portals. Channel manager integration achieves syncing of data with Airbnb, Booking.com, Vrbo, HomeAway, Expedia, more. Free 30-day trial, no credit card required, flat subscription pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Guesty is the ultimate platform for vacation rental managers with 5+ properties, facilitating all of their tasks from start to finish.
related_products.features: Guesty is the industry's leading short-term rental property management software for vacation rental companies with 5+ listings. Their cutting-edge platform automates, streamlines and simplifies the most time-consuming tasks involved in managing rentals. With 15+ features built in-house to facilitate growth & provide positive user experiences, property management companies around the world looking to scale & adapt to the ever-changing ecosystem rely on Guesty to power and optimize their business.

similar_products.short_desc: Leading vacation rental software with fee-free distribution, trust accounting, reservation management, & more for property managers.
similar_products.features:
Escapia is a proven, full-featured property management solution offering business guidance you can trust and automation to simplify. With innovative tools backed by Expedia Group data, it's never been easier to optimize your vacation rental business.  

Escapia also has strong core functionality such as trust accounting, reservation calendar, distribution, housekeeping, owner portal, & more. 

Escapia is one of the most trusted and widely used vacation rental software solutions in the industry.

similar_products.short_desc: LiveRez is the all in one vacation rental management software bringing you a powerful ecosystem of products included to help you scale!
similar_products.features:
LiveRez goes beyond the standard vacation rental management software. With LiveRez, you can replace your accounting software, booking software, CRM, and operations software. Add to that an included brand-new website that's built to convert and support from our staff, and you have a powerful connected ecosystem of features that will help you reach your goals.

You'll have everything you need, including access to built-in-house connections to the industry's leading OTA's like VRBO and Airbnb.

similar_products.short_desc: Solonis is a cloud-based property management solution for hotels that offers booking charts, reports, utilities, reservations & more.
similar_products.features: Solonis is a cloud-based integrated property management system powered by an intuitive business intelligence platform.  Designed by hospitality executives to serve the often fragmented operations of hotels, resorts, and other hospitality venues, properties using Solonis realize increased occupancy, enhanced guest experience, and revenue optimization.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline is a powerful vacation rental & property management software built to maximize conversions, efficiency, and revenue.
similar_products.features: Maximize Conversions|Efficiency|Revenue. Streamline is a powerful vacation rental/property management software built by property managers to help save time and increase profits. Integrate direct with VRBO/AirBnB/Booking.com/Tripadvisor/Expedia. Limitless integrations to help grow your business. Get a new website or integrate your existing website. Manage short/long term rentals. Easy to use owners module. Manage housekeeping/maintenance with our new Property Care app.

similar_products.short_desc: NewBook's cloud-based vacation rental software allows owners to seamlessly manage their properties anywhere, any time.
similar_products.features: NewBook's intuitive, cloud-based vacation rental software allows owners of holiday lettings, vacation homes, and Airbnbs to manage their properties from one centralized platform, anywhere, any time. Our multi-award-winning solution includes a PMS, Booking Engine, Channel Manager, web design services, automation tools, an in-built marketing module, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Breezeway is the leading property operations and services platform for short-term rentals.
similar_products.features: Breezeway's property operations platform helps coordinate, communicate, and verify detailed work at properties, and deliver the best service experience to guests and homeowners. Our software and mobile apps have facilitated over 6M property tasks across 100+ million square feet and help hundreds of hospitality professionals meet detailed service standards. Combining robust property data, smart messaging, and mobile-first task management, Breezeway is building the future of property care.

similar_products.short_desc: Operto Teams works with AirBnb, VRBO and other booking software (like Guesty) by importing bookings and auto-creating work schedules.

Operto Teams (formerly VRScheduler) is the best software platform for scheduling and tracking cleaners, inspectors and maintenance staff. Operto Teams works with your booking software to improve workflow.  Save time, optimize labor and minimize costly mistakes.  Free Trial.  Take a Demo Today!

similar_products.short_desc: The All-in-One Software for Short-Term & Vacation Rentals. One subscription, all tools. 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
similar_products.features:
Smoobu is the All-in-One Software for Short-Term & Vacation Rentals.

Smoobu syncs all your booking portals, such as Airbnb, Booking.com, VRBO, Trip.com, Agoda etc, automatically, so you no longer need to worry about double bookings and manual prices.

One subscription, all tools. Channel Manager, PMS, Website Builder, Booking Engine, Unified Inbox, Online Check-In, as well as a Dedicated Guest Guide that will make your reviews go up. 

Try Smoobu Pro for 14 days. No credit card required.

Automatically import your listings directly from Airbnb & connect to Booking.com & others in minutes. Instantly sync bookings, rates and availabilities with 0% commission, no setup costs and no hidden fees.

Save hours every week with automated messages, smart rates and much more.

related_categories.description: Real Estate Property Management software automates back office, financial, and operational tools for real estate property managers. These applications provide rental management software tools for apartments, rental housing, commercial property, mobile home parks, storage facilities and property owner associations and enable users to track tenant information, vacancies, and leasing agreements. Real Estate Property Management solutions enable reporting on revenue generation, operational costs, cash flow, budgeting and forecasting. Real Estate Property Management software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Lease Management software and Real Estate Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental software automates business management, record keeping, and accounting for rental businesses, including retail stores and rental property management firms. These applications enable the automation and integration of core business processes such as point of sale (POS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), accounting and inventory management as well as customer satisfaction tools. Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.

related_categories.description: Timeshare software helps manage sales, marketing, scheduling, touring and commission calculations for timeshare and vacation club businesses.
